trans-unit.source: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 [예제별 쿼리](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e)를 사용할 때 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher" /> 개체에 전달되는 "더미" 보안 주체 개체의 읽기 전용 속성을 수정할 수 있도록 특정 특성에 대한 쓰기 액세스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> class is accessed from a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property, and is effectually treated like a property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object, and isn't intended to be used on its own.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> 에서 액세스 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> 개체를 통해는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> 속성을 고의 속성은 처리 매핑하면는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> 개체를 자체적으로 사용 하기 위한 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal" /> object.
Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters" /> object.
Not intended to be called directly.

Applications should access <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property of the user object.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 액세스 해야 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> 통해는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> 사용자 개체의 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>expirationTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate" /> attribute to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate" /> 특성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 지정된 시간 및 비교 형식으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.

If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 지정는 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 속성의 프로그램 <xref:System.DateTime> 개체로 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>lockoutTime</c> should be used in the comparison.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime" /> query filter to the specified time and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime" /> 쿼리 필터를 지정된 시간 및 비교 형식으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.

If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 지정는 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 속성의 프로그램 <xref:System.DateTime> 개체로 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute
An object.
The object type of <c>value</c>.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>value</c> should be compared to the attribute's value.
Creates a query filter for a property in an extended class.
trans-unit.target: 확장된 클래스에서 속성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: In an extended class, you might implement an advanced search filter for `LogonCount`:
trans-unit.target: 확장된 된 클래스에 대 한 고급 검색 필터를 구현할 수 `LogonCount`:

trans-unit.source: An integer.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>badLogonCount</c> should be compared to the attribute's value.
Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount" /> attribute to the specified value and comparison type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.BadLogonCount" /> 특성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 지정된 값 및 비교 형식으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>lastAttempt</c> should be used in the comparison.

Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastBadPasswordAttempt" /> 특성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 지정된 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 및 지정된 비교 값으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.

If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 지정는 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 속성의 프로그램 <xref:System.DateTime> 개체로 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>logonTime</c> should be used in the comparison.

Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastLogon" /> 특성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 지정된 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 및 지정된 비교 값으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.

If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 지정는 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 속성의 프로그램 <xref:System.DateTime> 개체로 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType" /> that specifies how <c>passwordSetTime</c> should be used in the comparison.

Sets the query filter for the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet" /> attribute to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> and the specified comparison value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.LastPasswordSet" /> 특성에 대한 쿼리 필터를 지정된 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 및 지정된 비교 값으로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The time will default to UTC.

If you want to specify the time in local time, then specify the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of your <xref:System.DateTime> object as <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 시간을 현지 시간으로 지정 하려는 경우 다음 지정는 <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> 속성의 프로그램 <xref:System.DateTime> 개체로 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.
